description: The configuration object for the current rule.

target.description: The configuration target for this rule. You must set the target to `ua` for User Agent Blocking rules.

value.description: The exact user agent string to match. This value will be compared to the received `User-Agent` HTTP header value.
value.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4
